## Purpose

This repository exists to support development of the Alaska Energy Data Gateway by the Alaska Center for Energy and Power (ACEP) at the University of Alaska Fairbanks (UAF) and the Institute for Social and Economic Research (ISER) at the University of Alaska Anchorage (UAA).

## Funding

This project was built with support from State of Alaska capital appropriations for the Alaska Energy Data Gateway.
